# Blog logo with `hexSticker`


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(hexSticker)
library(magrittr)
```
:::


## File names


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
file_image <- "lightning_icon_white.png"
file_name <- "logo.png"
```
:::



## Create sticker


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
file_image %>%
  sticker(package = '[ENERGYCODE]',
          p_size = 19,
          p_y = 1.3, 
          h_fill = 'black',
          h_color = 'grey',
          s_x = 1,
          s_y = 0.7,
          filename = file_name)
```
:::
